content: the little star is a quick and fun crochet pattern you can use your finished stars for cards to decorate your gifts christmas tree or table or make a whole bunch and join them into a garland i wrote down the crochet pattern including a chart and it s available here 1 on the website for free the instructions contain a written pattern and a crochet chart as well as detailed information on the amount of yarn needed i hope that you enjoy this little pattern and i would love to see your creations 1 https //merinoandtomatoes com/patterns-tutorials/little-star-crochet-pattern/
